content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for considering the apartment for rent. I understand that you are interested in the highest possible rental price. Could you please provide me with your budget for the rental? This will help me determine the best possible price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Thank you.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I see, thank you for your response. While I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible price, it is important to keep in mind that the rental price will also depend on the location and other factors such as utilities and maintenance costs. If you could provide me with more information about your budget and the location of the apartment, I will be happy to provide you with a more accurate rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ryanah. I must say that I am pleased to hear that you are willing to pay 500 Euros per month for the rental. This price is competitive in the Munich market and will allow me to maximize my gains as a landlord. Thank you for your business and I look forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine
